title.rendered: How to Research, Cultivate, and Track Employer Relationships with a Purpose with Cal Poly San Luis Obispo

content.rendered:
Struggling to connect with the “right” employers for your school and students? Cal Poly San Luis Obispo presented on managing employer relationships in Handshake during our User Meetup at Utah Valley University. Learn practical techniques on how to leverage data and Handshake functionality to enhance employer relationships and build stronger recruiting partnerships. This session will help you understand how to maximize the Handshake system for you to gain an advantage with the most relevant employers for you.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Learn practical techniques on how to leverage data and Handshake functionality to enhance employer relationships and build stronger recruiting partnerships.
